英文公告.機關名稱: Taiwan Area National Freeway Bureau, MOTC
英文公告.標案名稱: National Freeway Bridge Seismic Retrofitting Project (2nd stage) M35 Bid
英文公告.廠商名稱: Up to Construction Engineering Co., Ltd.
英文公告.廠商地址: 1F., No.505, Yongda St., Dali Dist., Taichung City 41283, Taiwan (R.O.C.)
英文公告.附加說明: Project title: National Freeway Bridge Seismic Retrofitting Project(2nd)stage M35 BidThe date for publication:December 10th, 2012The deadline for submission of tender: 05:00 p.m., December 17th, 2012Tender opening:10:00 a.m., December 18th, 2012Bid Bond:NT$ 20,800,000The place for tender opening:(The first office meeting room) 70 Panshanya, Liming Village , Taishan District , New Taipei City, Taiwan R.O.C.Scope of work:There are total 12 bridges in need of being retrofitted in the M35 bid including southbound and northbound. On National Freeway No.3, there are Wan-qi river bridge (367k+878) of Xinhwa-tianlian section and Er-ren river bridge (370k+455) of Tianlian-yanchoa section. In addition, Mei-nong river bridge, Yi-yang river bridge, Li-gang No. 1 spillway bridge, and Ping No.92 crossing bridge are on Chishan branch line of National Freeway No.10The major tasks are as follows:Foundation Retrofit, Steel Jacketing, Pier Caps Retrofit, Abutments Retrofit, Concrete Shear Blocks, Steel Shear keys, Loss Prevention Device, Shock Transmission Units, Restrainers Installation and replacement, and so on.Others: Please check the bid documents.
